name: Castle of Shikigami 式神の城
description: Castle of Shikigami is a dark, supernatural vertically-scrolling shoot-’em-up classic. Summer, 2005: Tokyo's Metropolitan Police Force is investigating an occult serial killer. Specialists have been called in to investigate. The case is called “The Castle of Shikigami Incident”.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 8.1 / 10 Processor: Intel Core i3 2.3 GHz or better Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: OpenGL support 1GB RAM DirectX: Version 11 Storage: 600 MB available space Sound Card: OpenAL support Additional Notes: Xinput controller recommended, Windows 7 working, but unsupported
